CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 19, 1945, pg. 9, reads: "Mason Singers to Appear - The talented and tuneful Mason Singers will appear in concert May 24, at 8 o'clock, at St. Luke Baptist Church. The singers have made notable appearances throughout the county, always with remarkable success, and next Thursday night's recital will be a highlight of the season's musical entertainment. Members of the group are Virginia Motley, Essie Horne, Elizabeth Edwards, Beatrice Finch and Georgie Norris, director. Mary S. Hunt will be guest soloist. The mortgage fund of St. Luke will benefit. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mason Singers, including Virginia Motley, Essie Horne, Elizabeth Edwards, and Beatrice Finch wearing choir robes and posed in front of light colored background, in Harris Studio
